QuestData.Title: Ice and Fire
QuestData.Description: Soren did well to send you out on recon. That's some good information you have right there.$b$bTrouble is, this just adds more work for us to do. The trolls, confused as they are right now, still would like to kick the dwarves right out of Coldridge. And I'm certainly not going to let some fiery demon turn our snowy valley into a mountain lake.$b$bThe troll leader, his servants, and the fire creature should all be in the cave to the southeast. Take 'em all out.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Grik'nir the Cold, 6 Frostmane Blades, 3 Frostmane Novices, and the Wayward Fire Elemental.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad you've returned safely, $n. While it may not look like it now, you've proven to be a tremendous asset in the protection of Anvilmar.$b$bHere, take this as a symbol of my gratitude.
